title: News Article Search
description: This project is a simple web application that allows users to search for articles using the New York Times Article Search API.

title: Quiz Challenge
description: An interactive quiz experience featuring dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript code.

title: Calendar App
description: The Daily Planner App is a web application that helps employees with busy schedules manage their time effectively.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A Weather App designed to provide users with real-time weather information based on their location or a specified city.

title: Eataway Website
description: This is a website that features a recipe generator and meal planner, both powered by third-party APIs for enhanced functionality.

title: Password Generator
description: This browser-based app generates secure passwords tailored to user-selected criteria, providing enhanced online security with ease of use.
